name: Bagman Comes Back
description:
This game is a homage to Bagman, an arcade game released by Valadon Automation in 1982.

This version is made up of 8 completely new stages.

NB: If you are using Google Chrome to download Bagman Comes Back, you may be warned that the file is not downloaded often and that it could be dangerous. That is only a precautionary notice. Open the menu via the button to the right of the message and select "Keep". Then use your PC's antivirus to make sure it is a completely secure file.
